note:
__CLIENT CONTACT__
__Details:__  Davis Robinson
502-551-1755
DOB: 08/09/67
SSN: 401-98-3881

Address
9861 Cherbourg Dr
Union, KY 41091


DOA 5/2/2025
Location: Lima Ohio
1940 Roschman Ave, Lima, OH 45804

Description
 Client and friend walked out of establishment, was dark, park under light pole, let friend into passenger side, walked around his car, when he stepped into a “crevice” next to his car. He said he sent a video to AW

Went back to hotel, laid down and started shaking, had chills, cold sweats. Left leg was really hurting, couldn’t bend it. 

Went to Lima Memorial Hospital in Lima Ohio

Nothing broken, but did have a chip in his left ankle, placed in ace bandage and suggested he get a MRI and discharged around 3am 

Will have upcoming MRI in Union KY at St. Elizabeth physicians primary care.

Address for MRI
2200 Conner Rd
Hebron, KY 41048
Ph 859-442-6600 
__Person Making Contact:__ Justin
__Date & Time__: May 06 2025
note_summary: On May 2, 2025, Davis Robinson sustained an injury after stepping into a crevice outside a Lima, Ohio establishment. He reported experiencing chills, cold sweats, and leg pain afterward, and was treated at Lima Memorial Hospital where a chipped left ankle was diagnosed. He was advised to undergo an MRI at St. Elizabeth Physicians in Hebron, KY. Contact was made by Justin on May 6, 2025.

note:
__FW: Discover Additional Records for Request REQ-21243930__
From:  [justin@whaleylawfirm.com](mailto:justin@whaleylawfirm.com)
To: [DavisRobinsonSFZ4998052@louisvilleaccidentlawyer.filevineapp.com](mailto:DavisRobinsonSFZ4998052@louisvilleaccidentlawyer.filevineapp.com)
Date: Thu May 08 2025 11:26:26 GMT-04:00

 

 

From: noreply@salesforce.com  On Behalf Of no-reply
Sent: Thursday, May 8, 2025 11:26 AM
To: jchumbley.wlf@gmail.com
Subject: Discover Additional Records for Request REQ-21243930

 

Hello Justin,


You recently submitted a records request under Request REQ-21243930. This
request is in process and we will keep you updated on the status as it
progresses.

As an added benefit, we're excited to share that based on the patient
information from your request, we've also identified a list of additional
providers with relevant patient records that may be helpful to you.

If you would like to view the list of providers and order additional patient
records, please click the link below. 

 
 

  

How does ChartSwap partner with you on finding additional records? 

1.	ChartSwap searches for additional records: After submitting a record
request, ChartSwap will search for additional patient records, enabling more
insight into the patient's history.  

2.	You will receive an email from ChartSwap if additional records are
found: ChartSwap will send you a communication sharing the valuable provider
locations that may have additional patient records (if applicable).  

3.	View additional records: Log into ChartSwap and navigate to the
Record Finder page. After the ChartSwap provided patient authorization
  is submitted and approved, the provider details will be
visible for your review. The search results will include a listing of
locations where the patient received care and the record types available for
retrieval. 

4.	Request the records valuable for your case: Select the records you
would like to retrieve - you can select a single location or as many as
needed. 

5.	ChartSwap retrieves additional records: ChartSwap retrieves the
selected records and notifies you once they are available in the ChartSwap
portal.


Please note a completed ChartSwap provided patient authorization
  is required to view the full list of additional providers.


Thank you,
  ChartSwap
note_summary: A notification confirms a ongoing records request (REQ-21243930), informing Justin that additional patient records from various providers have been identified through ChartSwap. Justin can view, select, and request these records via the ChartSwap portal, once patient authorization is completed.

Hi DAVIS, Thank you for choosing Emergency Physicians of Northwest Ohio for your care. Your insurance has been billed, and the remaining balance is your responsibility (deductible, co-insurance, or copay). Click the button below to view your bill and make a payment. We understand medical bills can be stressful, and we're here to help with any questions or concerns. 

 



  Make Payment 

 



   

Call us: (877) 901-9237 


   

Send us a message: Click the link above, login with your date of birth, then click Contact Us link 

 



You have received this business communication as part of our efforts to fulfill your request or service your account. You will receive this and other transactional messages from Zotec Partners, the billing service provider for Emergency Physicians of Northwest Ohio, even if you have opted out of marketing messages. You can change your communication preferences for communications with Zotec Partners by logging in   here. 


Zotec Partners LLC @ 1 Zotec Way, Carmel, Indiana, 46032 United States
